core.user

Class UserAccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.account.AccountManager<User>
      • core.user.UserAccountManager

  • public class UserAccountManager
extends AccountManager<User>
    Class that manages User's.

    • Method Detail

      • createUser

        public void createUser(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password)
        Creates a User with input username and password.
        Parameters:
        username - The username that the User wants to use.
        password - The password that the User wants to use.

      • createGuest

        public void createGuest()
        Creates and adds a guest(demo) User to accounts.

      • guestNotExist

        public boolean guestNotExist()
        Checks whether or not a guest(demo) User exists in accounts.
        Returns:
        true if no guest exists, false if guest exists.

      • getCity

        public java.lang.String getCity(java.lang.String username)
        Gets the city that the current User is in.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the User to be checked.
        Returns:
        the city that the User lives in.

      • setCity

        public ActionReverter setCity(java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String city)
        Changes User's city information. An empty list is set if user want to delete his/her city information.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the User to be checked.
        city - the new city information of this User.
        Returns:
        ActionReverter for reverting this action.

      • deletedFromBlockList

        public ActionReverter deletedFromBlockList(java.lang.String username,
                                           java.lang.String blockUsername)
        Deletes the username of another user from current User's blockList.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the User who wants to edit his blockList.
        blockUsername - the username of another user to be deleted from current User's blockList.
        Returns:
        ActionReverter for reverting this action.

      • addToBlockList

        public ActionReverter addToBlockList(java.lang.String username,
                                     java.lang.String blockUsername)
        Adds the username of another user into current User's blockList.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of User who wants to edit his blockList.
        blockUsername - the username of another user to be added into current User's blockList.
        Returns:
        ActionReverter for reverting this action.

      • getBlockList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getBlockList(java.lang.String username)
        Gets the usernames of all users in the blockList of User.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the User whose blockList to be returned.
        Returns:
        a list of String, each represents a username of a user blocked by user.

      • getUserAccountSpecifics

        public java.lang.String[] getUserAccountSpecifics(java.lang.String username)
        Gets all details of the input user.
        Parameters:
        username - the User to be searched.
        Returns:
        a string representative of the description of this User account, or empty list if the user does not exist in the system.

      • getFilteredUsers

        public java.util.List<User> getFilteredUsers(java.lang.String username)
        Finds all User that user can trade with. That is, Users who are in the same city with user, not in user's blockList, not blocked user, not onVacation, not Guest, etc.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the User that want to find Users.
        Returns:
        a list of Users satisfied all the conditions mentioned above.

      • creditAddition

        public void creditAddition(java.lang.String username)
        Add points to given user's credit.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user whose credit is going to go up.

      • creditSubtraction

        public void creditSubtraction(java.util.List<java.lang.String> usernames)
        Subtract points from given user's credit.
        Parameters:
        usernames - a list of username of Users whose credits are going to go down.

      • oneToOneMessage

        public ActionReverter oneToOneMessage(Account sender,
                                      Account receiver,
                                      java.lang.String message)
        Send the message from sender Account to receiver Account. senderType will be shown in the message. If sender is blocked by the receiver, sender will still see the message in messageSent but receiver won't see it in messageReceived.
        Parameters:
        sender - the Account that sends the message.
        receiver - the Account that receives the message.
        message - the message that needs to be sent.
        Returns:
        ActionReverter for reverting this action.
